God of WisdomAnswered on 07 Apr 2019Better in what sense?Since you've already invested in multiple instruments, why don't you just add more into your preferred one? You want to build a a strong overall portfolio. It may seem that you have things just everywhere and it may not be consolidated well. Maybe the only thing you have not tried is to start your own business?0 comments0
